name: Project Chimera
description:
Project Chimera is a gamified learning experience inspired by science in VR, which allows players to explore a vast spaceship and learn about various topics.
You find your self before a door in a forest in the middle of nowhere. This door is an entrance to a mysterious spaceship. This spaceship has a central elevator which will be used as a level selection portal. In each level, you should solve puzzles to fix the spaceship and help it to be ready for launch again.
